      • transferLoan

        public Loan transferLoan(int loanId,
                         Bank currentBank,
                         Bank otherBank)
        Description copied from interface: ICustomerService
        Transfers a loan from a bank to another. If the current user does not have an account at the other bank, the account will be created. The transfer is transactional. If any of the required operation fails, all prior operations will be rolled back.
        Specified by:
        transferLoan in interface ICustomerService
        Parameters:
        loanId - of the loan at the current bank
        currentBank - the current customer's bank where the loan is from
        otherBank - the new bank the loan is transferred to
        Returns:
        the new loan created at the other bank
